verses.name: Numbers 16:41
verses.text: But on the morrow all the congregation of the children of Israel murmured against Moses and against Aaron, saying, Ye have killed the people of the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 16:42
verses.text: And it came to pass, when the congregation was gathered against Moses and against Aaron, that they looked toward the tabernacle of the congregation: and, behold, the cloud covered it, and the glory of the Lord appeared.

verses.name: Numbers 16:43
verses.text: And Moses and Aaron came before the tabernacle of the congregation.

verses.name: Numbers 16:44
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,
